item.title: All Publications
item.description: All Publications Selected Publications My complete list of peer-reviewed scientific articles (2003-2017). See my Google Scholar for citations and sources. Charbonnier, F., Roupsard, O., le Maire, G., Guillemot, J., Casanoves, F., Lacointe, A., Vaast, P., Allinne, C., Audebert, L., Cambou, A., Clement-Vidal, A., Defrenet, E., Duursma, R.A., Jarri, L., Jourdan, C., Khac, E., Leandro, P., Medlyn, B.E., Saint-Andre, L., Thaler, P., Van Den Meersche, K., Barquero Aguilar, A., Lehner, P.

item.title: R Code
item.description: I have been writing R code since 2001. Since a few years, a lot of this can be found on either github or bitbucket. Sometimes I write a blog where I use R to solve unimportant (but nagging) problems. Topics include board games, the price of petrol in Sydney, or setting up an API for your R code. Over the years I have developed over a dozen R packages, often implementing more challenging analytical methods with a nice R-friendly interface.

item.title: Selected Publications
item.description: All Publications Selected Publications Selected peer-reviewed publications, 2003 - 2017. See my Google Scholar for citations and sources. Canopy structure, allometry and plant architecture Duursma, R.A., Gimeno, T.E., Boer, M.M., Crous, K.Y., Tjoelker, M.G., Ellsworth, D.S. 2016. Canopy leaf area of a mature evergreen Eucalyptus woodland does not respond to elevated atmospheric [CO2] but tracks water availability. Global Change Biology, 22, 1666-1676 . Duursma, R.A., Falster, D.S. 2016.
